item.description:
Join us for an 11th Truth Action Day

Park st. Station


i will only be able to make it to the station slightly after 430 pm but if you would like please show up to pass out information before i get to the location. bring you signs and fliers. i will bring what i have (ae911truth banner, 911 truth now signs, and WeAreChange.org fliers) Waldo and i went to this exact location on the for rush hour 7-8-08 and we were able to pass out quite a few fliers.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Truth Action Day
